sentences.sContent: I didn't ask for the chairmanship. I was pitched into it.
sentences.sContent_eng: I didn't ask for the chairmanship. I was pitched into it.
sentences.sCn: 我并不要求主席职位，我是被迫接受的。

sentences.sContent: What we expressed to them is that we know they did not ask for this.
sentences.sContent_eng: What we expressed to them is that we know they did not ask for this.
sentences.sCn: 我们向他们表明的就是我们知道他们不要对这件事有什么刻意要求。
